Fanatic Energy.name: Fanatic Energy
Fanatic Energy.flavor: You fight with the focused passion of belief, attacking twice in the time others take to make a single attack.
Fanatic Energy.effect: You use an at-will cleric attack power.

Battle Resolve.name: Battle Resolve
Battle Resolve.flavor: You channel the resolve granted by your divine magic to your allies, mending their wounds and empowering them for the fight to come.
Battle Resolve.effect: Each target can spend a healing surge. In addition, each target gains a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and to all defenses until the end of the encounter.

Victory Prayer.name: Victory Prayer
Victory Prayer.flavor: The power of the gods infuses you and your allies, raising you to unmatched heights of battle prowess.
Victory Prayer.target: You and one or two allies in the burst
Victory Prayer.effect: Each target can use an at-will attack power as a minor action once during his or her next turn.
